import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/Navbar.scss' import { IoCartOutline } from 'react-icons/io5' const Navbar = () => { const categories = useSelector(state => state.categories) const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) return (
Fake Shop
{cart && cart.length ? ( {cart.length} ) : <>}
    {categories && categories.map((category, i) => (
  • {category}
    • ))}
) } export default Navbar
